line: i just moved in next door and i was wondering if you would be interested in battling me in a post apoplectic world for control of the galaxies last remaining energy source

if you let this go you’re going to be sitting around with your fingers soaking in stuff

the one that always stares at me when i come in

so can i come to bloomingdale’s and use the copy machine
well sure but they might think it’s kinda weird considering i don’t work there anymore
i i got a job at ralph lauren
but pheebs you can still use the copy machine where i actually work
but just come by at lunch so my boss doesn’t see you
cause kim will just freak out and she already doesn’t like me very much
i don’t think my boss likes me either
i don’t think mine likes me either
or maybe it’s because you’re hanging around here at 11 30 on a wednesday
yeah let’s head off to work
now you will not believe this
but i was in the copy room making copies and ralph lauren came in
he introduced himself and the next thing i know we’re making out
phoebe i mean you do know he’s married
what am i supposed to do
ask every guy i make out with if he’s married
uh can i talk to you for a second
this uh kid in this picture
do you uh know this kid

no i just thought it was cute
yeah that’s what i was afraid of
okay uhh look janine i really want you to feel at home here but some of this new stuff
pictures of cute babies we don’t know
look i don’t know this baby
i don’t know if she’s a famous artist or not
you know and i don’t want to be a jerk but you’re changing too much around here
i just thought i’d try to make the place a little nicer

you know like you got the candles and the foofy schmoofer thing here and over here you got a picture of a watering can
i’m sure it’s a famous watering can okay
but come on and what is with the really hot stick in the bathroom
but okay my towels for instance
i come in to the bathroom here and my towel is not on the floor where keep it
it’s up here on some hook
alright i can make my peace with the clean dry towels also what is with these chips you bought
no no no no it’s potpourri
well that’s like summer in a bowl
so you know i i handed in that marketing report and i never got to hear what you thought
so wow the spring line it’s really going to be great this year huh
so i hear the ralph lauren fooled around with someone in the copy room
well i think i shouldn’t look directly at them
ross they’re really really really white
yeah what was wrong with your old human teeth
ahh i i did leave the gel on a little longer then it said to
ross you know that tonight is your date with hillary
come on are they really that bad
oh hey hey rach do you notice anything
yes i saw them from outside
you guys are never going to believe this
but phoebe made out with ralph lauren
she ran into him at my office and they just made out
and the craziest thing is now my boss likes me because i told her about it and she said it was the best gossip she’d heard all year
i am proud of all my friends today
my god rachel i can’t believe phoebe made out with ralph lauren
oh i am no women but that is one tasty dish
that that is your make out buddy
yeah no ralph doesn’t look anything like that guy
he’s he’s young and he’s got long hair and a beard and a hacky sack
oh my god phoebe that’s not ralph lauren

if she finds out that i lied to her she is going to hate me even more

to get you to make out with him
okay maybe this will make your teeth look less white
okay colors that don’t work are blue yellow green red black white orange and purple
i don’t know what i’m going to do
that date starts in like an hour
hey ross maybe if your skin was lighter

so all i need to do is get some new skin
i’m just saying if we put just a little bit of makeup on you
ross this is the only thing left that has a shot at working
but won’t she notice i have makeup on
half the guys out there have makeup on
i mean just try it and see
i am not putting on makeup
ross could you put up some of these flyers for me
now are drawers will smell nice and we didn’t waste these pantyhose
yes god forbid we throw out old underwear
i’m going to go over to joey’s
wait we’re supposed to organize the wrapping paper drawer
yes but i feel like i’ve really gotten in touch with my feminine side enough today
in fact i think we’re two sachets away from becoming a lesbian couple
this has been kind of a girlie day
i feel like i need to be in guy place
you know do kind of like a man thing
go over to joey’s and drink some beer and hammer up some drywall
you know when guys hang out they don’t just drink some beer and hammer up drywall
when girls hang out we don’t have pillow fights in our underwear
i don’t know why i said that
hey ross i was wondering if oh my god
yeah remember that thing i told you that happened yesterday
you didn’t cancel the fabric order from taiwan
remember i told you that someone made out with ralph lauren in the copy room
well it turns out that’s not true
because i checked and only one keycard was used to access the copy machine yesterday during lunch and that keycard belonged to you rachel
oh god you think i made out with him
if you think sleeping with ralph is going to get you my job
i i don’t want your job
ohh this is such a mistake
i did not make out with him
i did not use my keycard yesterday
i don’t even know how to use my keycard
you could cut the sexual tension in here with a knife
and after that what could i do except become a chef
and someday soon i hope to open my own restaurant
you know you’re a really great listener
most guys i go out with they just talk and talk
after a while it’s like shut your mouth you know
i’ve probably been talking too much
why don’t we talk about you a little bit
i uh am from long island
i i came to the city for college
um i um have a 5 year old son and in my spare time i like to read spy novels
but but let’s talk more about you
if you sear the stems of the flowers first in a frying pan your arrangement will look fresh much longer
oh my god joey that is such a great tip
monica could you excuse us for a second
i need to talk to the girl with the flowers
oh but joey come over later because i’m going to teach you to make a bird feeder out of just a pine cone and some peanut butter
what is the matter with you
you got a picture a picture of a baby dressed like flowers
hey look i am still joey okay
flowers they’re just you know they’re nice to look at
and that happens to be a picture by a famous artist
it’s the way you said it
oh my god i’m a women
now she thinks that i made out with him and i did it to get her job

i did but she doesn’t think anyone would be stupid enough to confuse kenny the copy guy with ralph lauren
well hey what if kenny were the real brains behind the whole company
what if kenny hired that ralph lauren guy to be the pretty front man
huh did she ever think of that
you were with kenny today weren’t you
ohh phoebe what am i going to do
well the only thing you can do
i’m not going to sleep with ralph lauren
i mean i could but i wouldn’t
i’ve had a really good time tonight
you know i rarely connect with someone this much on the first date
i’ve had a really good time too you know
are you going to eat that bread
ohh i just like the smell
would you like to move over to the couch
maybe i’ll just turn the lights down a little
or should i say groovy poster
ohh you can see them huh

ohh i’ve been meaning to ask you
have you seen the new ralph lauren sheets
i’m sorry that i lied to you before
ralph and i were an item but were not anymore
he said rachel i can’t do this
even though you are a very very very beautiful women
and then i don’t know why but he said and you will never get promoted
especially not above kim who is an integral cog in the ralph lauren machine
he just gave you the coldest look i have ever seen
of course it’s true and it hurts so bad
hey uhh i need to talk to you
i’m sorry but we’ve got to get rid of all this girlie stuff in here
i uh i got to be a man
the living room has to remain a guy place okay
that’s just the way it has to be
well if that’s what you want
i’ll just put it all in my room
great great and thanks for being so understanding
i mean i didn’t want to make a big deal out of this you know
you could uh put the picture of the famous baby in my room
i mean if you want to
and uhh maybe the watering can there
and a couple of these little tiny boxes
do you want me to put it all in your room
